page.title: 20HOME EQUIPMENT IN KEMPSTON
page.content: In our survey over{90% of the homes} had one of each of the following:- { {colour TV,stereo,telephone,transistor {radio, refrigerator, freezer, vacuum {cleaner and car.}Videos <60%>, b&w TVs <79%>,computers <59%>,'Walkmans' <49%> lawnmowers <83%> & washing machines <51%> also featured strongly .Only 15% owned a dishwasher, 20% a microwave oven, 13% a caravan, 21% a tumble- drier and 11% a sewing machine.{Over {20% owned 2}colour TVs or telephones, while to a lesser extent 2 b&w TVs, stereos, computers, transistors, refrigerators, vacuum cleaners, freezers, cars & lawnmowers. A few homes had{3 or 4}colour TVs,{3}b&w TVs stereos, telephones, cars, lawnmowers, 'Walkmans' & transistors.Also noted by a small group - C.B.radios, knitting machines & many kitchen items{Daubeney {School Household Survey - 454 returns.
